clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Collapse of right middle lobe lobe with volume loss.
Focal consolidation in right middle lobe with air bronchogram.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in right middle lobe.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 24 mm in diameter.
Pleural effusion on the right middle lobe side, moderate in size.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in right middle lobe.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
